nodes.text: A palace was owned by Baron Reya on the planet Cato Neimoidia. It was located next to the Great Vaults of Cato Neimoidia, formerly the palace of Lott Dod. General Leia Organa traveled to the palace to place old clothing that belonged to her mother, Padmé Amidala, in Reya's vaults for safekeeping.
